https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5aeeBdCGFRUCuk0sSkhU9Y3Sl3S.jpg Germany, Baltic Sea coast, May 1945, a few days before the end of World War II. A small Soviet patrol arrives at an isolated house where an elderly baroness gives shelter to a group of orphan girls and a boy who is determined to continue the fight. 4 Days in May
